title: For this purpose of “carpet area” means the net usable floor area within a tenement excluding that c
clause_text: For this purpose of “carpet area” means the net usable floor area within a tenement excluding that covered by the walls or any other areas specifically exempted from floor space index computation as per prevailing Regulation.

source_pdf.text_snippet: For this purpose of “carpet area” means the net usable floor area within a tenement excluding that covered by the walls or any other areas
